title: Chien Yen Shabu Shabu
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Popular hot pot restaurant that also caters to vegetarians. For around NT$350-400 get all-you-can-eat hot pot. Choose from 2 types of vegetarian broth, get a big bowl of fresh vegetable with tofu, mushroom, taro, pumpkin, etc. There are many side dishes, sushi, and dessert that are vegetarian as well (vegans ask about dairy and egg).
